remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件可以包含任意数量的样式对象或继承的专用化程度的样式对象类。A control can contain any number of style objects, or more specialized style objects that inherit from the class. 这些应具有唯一的名称属性。These should have unique name properties. 你可以然后引用同一页面上的其他控件其属性。You can then refer to other controls on the same page by their property. 此类具有没有可视表示形式。This class has no visual representation. 页还可以使用外部样式表，并且多个页面可以共享相同的外部样式表。A page can also use an external style sheet, and several pages can share the same external style sheet. 有关样式有关的详细信息，请参阅[\<样式 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0048ce21-2c92-4377-a211-9aca9efdf748)元素和主题。For more information about styles, refer to the [\

permission.span: 用于在托管环境中操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同不从其父文件夹继承属性。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果你设置青色父控件，子控件的属性将不会继承青色的背景色。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit the background color of cyan. 您必须显式设置子控件的到青色，或者让你的属性必须设置属性的父控件并应用于子控件的样式表。You must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是位于只读接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 你可以使用其中此方法适用的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除集合中的或有关的所有样式，它将都清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到字段的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的控件，并要求你将数据重新绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在页面上的样式表继承中引用的用户控件的根级别定义的样式表样式。The style sheet on the page inherits the styles in a style sheet defined at the root level of the referenced user control. 例如，如果用户控件的样式表具有一个名为属性`Style1`，则页可以访问`Style1`就像它是在页上的样式表中。For example, if the style sheet on the user control has a property named `Style1`, the page can access `Style1` as if it were in the style sheet on the page.
